line_1: The bark, which winds and waves had brav'd
line_2: At length from foreign dangers sav'd,

line_1: — So when proud Rome the Afric Warrior braved,
line_2: And high on Alps his crimson banner waved;

line_1: Her love rejected, and her vengeance braved,
line_2: By Him her beauties won, her virtues saved. —
